jasbro.game.world.customContent.effects..message:
During a little bit of free time you meet the group of customers heading for the arena. Most of them pass you by without a word, or only a token greeting, but a single individual approaches you directly.
"Am I correct to assume you are the owner of this fine establishment?"
The man introduces himself as Varrick Smith and you soon realise that his noble and militaristic appearance is nothing but show.

He is actually a successful businessman, who sells captured monsters for a wide variety of purposes. As your discussion drifts to controlling the more powerful and dangerous beasts, his eyes light up.
"I have a special treat for you today, my friend."
You both enter a private section of the viewer stands of the arena, while down below today's monster is shoved into the arena by the man's assistants.

It is a Ninetails! A powerful and cunning kind of demon and a species of legendary tricksters. Almost human in appearance, he is only recognisable by his nine beautiful fox tails. You cannot help but wonder how such a being could ever be imprisoned by the likes of Varrick.
Then <c.name> enters the ring hesitantly. Varrick has a smug grin on his face and he pulls an glowing gem from one of his pockets. The businessman's hands glow for a second and the gem lights up. At the same time the blond demon down in the arena collapses and starts breathing heavily. <c.name> carefully approaches the fallen demon with worry edged on her face. Maybe she hasn't noticed his tails yet? Just before she reaches him Varrick's grin gets even wider and he once again does something with the gem in his hand. It changes color to a more reddish color and the fallen blond suddenly starts moving.

Red magic swirls around the beast and it stands up. <c.name> backs away slowly, clearly scared and the demon eyes her hungrily. You send a worried glance towards Varrick, but he just nods towards, clearly indicating that there is nothing to worry about.

"Eep!" <c.name> cries out as the demon pounces her and pushes her to the ground. With a few quick yanks from the powerful demon most of her clothes are gone. The fox's magic swirls around him, but it doesn't seem to hurt <c.name>. The beast quickly gets rid of his own clothes, before once again grabbing the helpless woman and positioning himself.
With a quick thrust the demon is inside her and he starts forcefully pounding into girl's nubile body, while fondling her breasts.

Slowly the scared slave starts to relax as the beast continues to push into her and you can see the first signs of pleasure o the girls face. For all the released magic harmlessly washing over her, the demon seems to be much more gentle than he appears at first. The blond continues fucking the bluenette for a while longer until he comes with a shudder.
But the show isn't quite over as you see Varrick once again sending a pulse of magic into the gem he is holding, a dangerous smile on his face.

The demon roars and suddenly expands in size. Now it has taken its original form. Almost the whole arena is filled out by the giant fox beast. <c.name> only has a brief moment to stare at it in fear, before she is grabbed again. The large beast lowers her onto his large and you can't help but worry for your slaves wellbeing but then you see her face contort with lust as the giant member enters her.
Up and down the demon moves her with its giant paws and <c.name> starts moaning incontrollably. It takes over twenty minutes until he shudders and comes inside the blue haired girl with another roar.

As the demon is being dragged away by Varrick's assistants, you and the businessman get into a heavy argument due to how he endangered your slave by pushing the fox demon so much. In the end he leaves, after calming you down by paying 5.000 gold for <c.name>'s services.
When you inspect the girl's injuries later, you are surprised to find that she is relatively alright. For all the power the demon has, he must have been holding back.
